info.name: Crypto Processing Platform API
info.description:
This is a high-level implementation for https://api.cryptoprocessing.io

CryptoProcessing is a platform for blockchain projects and businesses, that allows building blockchain applications in a short period and save time and money. It offers a standardized set of methods to work with acquirers, processing companies, liquidity providers, and different exchanges using given API for work with crypto and fiat currencies.

For more information about CryptoProcessing, visit https://cryptoprocessing.io or join us in https://t.me/CryptoProcessing

Created by the CryptoProcessing company.

item.name: Payments

header.description: Your Auth Key

Optional email of the user you want to process a payment 
for.

request.description:
"email": Optional Email address. If does not exist, X-Email header should be set.

"amount": float, amount of crypto you want to buy

"currency": eth or btc (lowercase)

"address": Optional eth or btc address to receive crypto. If X-Email header set, the user's addresses is used.

header.description: Your Auth Key

Optional email of the user you want to process a payment 
for.

item.description: A payments endpoints for credit/debit cards acquiring

request.description:
Create user. Requires email, password, and password_confirmation params.
User is an *abstract* model for just an identification way for wallets.
Fields password and password_confirmation may be used if you want to use our wallet solution for your users (additionally may be requested via email wallet@oom.ag).
Get input balances for user in ETH, BTC, ARX.
